question.string: Give me all school types.
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:SchoolTypes . }

question.string: Which presidents were born in 1945?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:President . ?uri onto:birthDate ?date . FILTER regex(?date,'^1945') . }

question.string: Who are the presidents of the United States?
question.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:President. ?uri prop:title res:President_of_the_United_States. }

question.string: Who was the wife of President Lincoln?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?person rdf:type onto:President . ?person foaf:surname 'Lincoln'@en . ?person onto:spouse ?uri. }

question.string: Who developed the video game World of Warcraft?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { res:World_of_Warcraft onto:developer ?uri . }

question.string: What is the official website of Tom Hanks?
question.query: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { res:Tom_Hanks foaf:homepage ?uri }

question.string: List all episodes of the first season of the HBO television series The Sopranos!
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri onto:series res:The_Sopranos . ?uri onto:seasonNumber 1 . }

question.string: Which people have as their given name Jimmy?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type foaf:Person. ?uri foaf:givenName 'Jimmy'@en . }

question.string: Is there a video game called Battle Chess?
question.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> ASK WHERE { ?software rdf:type onto:Software . ?software rdfs:label ?name . FILTER (regex(?name, 'Battle Chess')) }

question.string: Which mountains are higher than the Nanga Parbat?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Mountain . ?acon rdfs:label 'Nanga Parbat'@en . ?acon prop:elevationM ?elevation . ?uri prop:elevationM ?allelevation . FILTER (?allelevation > ?elevation) . OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Who created English Wikipedia?
question.query: PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?website rdf:type onto:Website . ?website onto:author ?uri . ?website rdfs:label 'English Wikipedia'@en . OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Give me all actors starring in Batman Begins.
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?actor WHERE { res:Batman_Begins onto:starring ?actor . }

question.string: Which companies work in the aerospace industry as well as on nuclear reactor technology?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Company . ?uri prop:industry res:Aerospace . ?uri prop:industry res:Nuclear_reactor_technology . }

question.string: Give me the websites of companies with more than 500000 employees.
question.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?subject rdf:type onto:Company . ?subject prop:numEmployees ?employees . FILTER( xsd:integer(?employees) >= 500000 ) . ?subject foaf:homepage ?uri . }

question.string: Which actors were born in Germany?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Actor . ?uri onto:birthPlace res:Germany . }

question.string: Which country does the Airedale Terrier come from?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?country WHERE { res:Airedale_Terrier prop:country ?country }

question.string: Which birds are there in the United States?
question.query: PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:BirdsOfTheUnitedStates. }

question.string: Give me all European Capitals!
question.query: PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:CapitalsInEurope. }

question.string: Which cities have more than 2 million inhabitants?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:City. ?uri prop:population ?population. FILTER (xsd:integer(?population) > 2000000) . }

question.string: Who was Tom Hanks married to?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?spouse WHERE { res:Tom_Hanks prop:spouse ?spouse . }

question.string: When was DBpedia released?
question.query: PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?date WHERE { res:DBpedia onto:releaseDate ?date . }

question.string: Which people were born in Heraklion?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Person . ?uri onto:birthPlace res:Heraklion . }

question.string: Which caves have more than 3 entrances?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Cave . ?uri onto:numberOfEntrances ?entrance . FILTER (?entrance > 3) . }

question.string: Give me all films produced by Hal Roach.
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Film . ?uri onto:producer res:Hal_Roach }

question.string: Which software has been published by Mean Hamster Software?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Software . ?uri onto:publisher res:Mean_Hamster_Software . }

question.string: What languages are spoken in Estonia?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri onto:spokenIn res:Estonia . }

question.string: Who owns Aldi?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { res:Aldi onto:keyPerson ?uri . }

question.string: Which capitals in Europe were host cities of the Summer Olympic Games?
Who has been the 5th president of the United States of America?
question.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:President . ?uri onto:orderInOffice '5th President of the United States'@en . }

question.string: Who is called Dana?
question.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type foaf:Person. ?uri foaf:givenName 'Dana'@en. }

question.string: Which music albums contain the song Last Christmas?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?single rdf:type onto:Single . ?single onto:album ?uri . ?single foaf:name 'Last Christmas'@en . OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Which books were written by Danielle Steel?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Book . ?uri onto:author res:Danielle_Steel . }

question.string: Which companies are located in California, USA?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Organisation . ?uri onto:location res:California . }

question.string: Which genre does DBpedia belong to?
question.query: PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?dbpedia rdf:type onto:Software . ?dbpedia onto:genre ?uri . ?dbpedia rdfs:label 'DBpedia'@en . OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: In which programming language is GIMP written?
question.query: PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { res:GIMP onto:programmingLanguage ?uri . }

question.string: Who produced films starring Natalie Portman?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?film rdf:type onto:Film . ?film onto:starring res:Natalie_Portman . ?film onto:producer ?uri . }

question.string: Give me all movies with Tom Cruise!
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Film. ?uri onto:starring res:Tom_Cruise . }

question.string: In which films did Julia Roberts as well as Richard Gere play?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Film . ?uri onto:starring res:Julia_Roberts . ?uri onto:starring res:Richard_Gere. }

question.string: Give me all female German chancellors!
question.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT ?uri ?string WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:FemaleHeadsOfGovernment. ?uri prop:office ?office . FILTER regex(?office, 'Chancellor of Germany'). OPTIONAL {?uri rdfs:label ?string . FILTER (lang(?string) = 'en') } }

question.string: Who wrote the book The pillars of the Earth?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { res:The_Pillars_of_the_Earth onto:author ?uri . }

question.string: Give me all soccer clubs in the Premier League.
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri onto:league res:Premier_League . }

question.string: When was Capcom founded?
question.query: PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT ?date WHERE { res:Capcom prop:foundation ?date . }

question.string: Which organizations were founded in 1950?
question.query: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX prop: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Organisation . ?uri prop:foundation ?date . FILTER regex(?date,'^1950') . }

question.string: What is the highest mountain?
question.query: PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX onto: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type onto:Mountain . ?uri onto:elevation ?elevation . } ORDER BY DESC(?elevation) LIMIT 1
